version_description: - Various bug fixes.
- Various bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue where users were unable to save the second photo (and any subsequent photos) from chats.
- Other minor bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue where users were unable to save the second photo (and any subsequent photos) from chats.
- Other minor bug fixes.

- You can now configure your notification settings.
- Minor bugs fixed.

Thanks for using LINE Official Account Manager.
If you aren't getting notifications after updating the app, go to "User settings" > Notifications and check that notifications are turned on.
To report any issues or give us some feedback, go to Help > "Check the manual".

- You can now configure your notification settings.
- Minor bugs fixed.

Thanks for using LINE Official Account Manager.
If you aren't getting notifications after updating the app, go to "User settings" > Notifications and check that notifications are turned on.
To report any issues or give us some feedback, go to Help > "Check the manual".

- Opening chat messages now removes their notification from Notifications Center.
- Minor bugs fixed.

Thanks for using LINE Official Account Manager. To report any issues or give us some feedback, go to Help > "FAQ / Contact us"
